sentences: MISSION is a collective of Creative and MarTech Agencies led by entrepreneurs who encourage an independent spirit
Employing 1,000 people across 27 locations and 3 continents, the Group successfully combines its diverse expertise to produce Work That Counts ™ for our Clients, whatever their ambitions
Creating real standout, sharing real innovation and delivering real growth for some of the world's biggest brands
We are a small but ambitious development team, working specifically on developing new internal software as well as maintaining and advancing existing systems
As member of this team, you’ll be making a real difference to the business by designing, developing and maintaining high quality software
We have an opportunity for a talented web developer familiar with using C#, SQL, and react to join MISSION group, based in our North Devon office
Reporting into our Principal Developer, we are looking for a confident self-starter, who is highly motivated and a team player
You will have demonstratable experience of developing data driven software with a polished finish
Working with the Principal Developer to design, develop, deliver and maintain new software
Working with the Project Manager to take user requirements and translate into functional software design
Interpreting user requirements to build effective and useable web applications
Working along-side the Senior Test Analyst to ensure stable and robust functionality
Reviewing work with the internal team and demonstrating initial builds during user team reviews
Continual improvement and maintenance and third line of the recently developed job costing, timesheet and reporting system
We would love if you also had experience of Git and Selenium, however this is not a necessity and full training will be provided where needed
25 days’ holiday, increasing to 29 after 2 years’ service + Plus Bank Holidays
Company pension scheme, with enhanced Employer contributions after 1 years’ service
Medical Cash Plan – including employee assist programme, contributions to dental, optical, physio etc
Employee Discount Scheme – an online platform for all staff offering a variety of discounts at various shopping outlets, gyms etc
Electric Car Purchase Scheme, via Salary Sacrifice
Outstanding training and progression, including access to LinkedIn Learning and The Mission Group Learning Management System
We are proud to be a Disability Confident Committed (Level 1) Employer

As a Disability Confident Committed Employer we have committed to; ensure our recruitment process is inclusive and accessible, communicating and promoting vacancies, offering an interview to disabled people who meet the minimum criteria for the job and anticipating and providing reasonable adjustments as required
Barnstaple, EX32 0RX: reliably commute or plan to relocate before starting work (required)
What salary are you looking for?
segment: We would love if you also had experience of Git and Selenium, however this is not a necessity and full training will be provided where needed
